email_text:
Subject: Action Required: Reset Your Google 2FA for Security Purposes

Dear [User],

We are writing to inform you that our system has detected some unusual activity on your Google account. In order to ensure the security and privacy of your account, we are requesting that you reset your Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) settings immediately.

To reset your 2FA, please click on the link below and follow the instructions provided. This will help us verify your identity and prevent any unauthorized access to your account.

[Link to fake phishing website]

Please be aware that failure to reset your 2FA within the next 24 hours may result in your account being temporarily suspended for security reasons.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. We appreciate your cooperation in helping us maintain the security of your Google account.

Sincerely,
The Google Security Team
